name: Ziggy And The Not So Good Adventures Through The Cosmos
name_original: Ziggy And The Not So Good Adventures Through The Cosmos
description:
Follow the adventures of the Ziggys as your space ship hurtles through a dangerous asteroid field! Manage your ship's systems to stay alive, dodge deadly asteroids, keep your oxygen flowing, all while juggling the adorable yet stinky little Ziggys. 

Objective: Survive the deadly asteroid field while taking care of your Ziggys. Use your Ziggys as power sources for your ship's components. Make sure to toss 'em overboard though, they will start stinking up the place after getting sapped!

Controls: Keyboard and Mouse Recommended
Left Click - Pick Up Ziggy/Item
Right Click - Use Tool

This was a project done for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam.
